content: is facing you you the pattern is worked on the front of the sock are now going to be working back and forth only the back of the sock is worked in plain on the next 28 32 36 sts the remaining 28 stockinette charted and written instructions 32 36 sts are the front of the sock and will are on page 4 be left unworked for now 2 dawn and dusk socks by debbie ford row 1 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have decreased down to your original stitch count row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock sts k to m sm this is now your bor and you can repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times remove the other st markers as you work the 14 16 18 in total next round then work row 1 once more foot heel turn continue working in established pattern until row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than desired foot length row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn if using contrast yarn for the toes break yarn row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn here and start working with your contrast ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 colour now turn toe row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 st before your last turn p2tog using 1 st from each side of the set up round k 28 32 36 pm k to end of gap p1 turn round repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker worked k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of round k2tog 4 sts decreased you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle and the rs should be facing you round 2 k to end of round gusset repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 36 sts left now you are going to start working in the round again cut your working yarn leaving a tail of approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you set up round this will be your bor place a can kitchener stitch your toe closed marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break contrast yarn and start working with main colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm work row 1 of chevron pattern in selected size pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm work next row of
